lines.text:
[to Scot Webster]
The world is full of questions which will never be answered. Don't try too hard.
Looks like I'm not the only thorn in your side.
Yes, but you're my favorite thorn.

[Screaming to Dr. Perry]
You want my brain after I'm dead?
No bruises, no abrasions, but practically every bone in his body is broken.
I find them dead - that's my job. You find out how they got that way. Good night!

[Wisecracking]
There's one doctor that couldn't give me aspirin.
Do you solemnly swear that the testimony you're about to give will be the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth, so help you God?
